title: Ticket #2311: allow transfer_output_files=  to mean "nothing"
description:
If you don't want any files back, you can currently put 

  +TransferOutput=""

in your submit file. It would be expected that I could put 

  transfer_output_files=

in my submit file to get the same behavior, but this does not work. It would be nice if it did.
remarks:
2017-Jul-27 10:35:37 by jfrey:
Condor_submit now supports the following: 
transfer_output_files = ""

This disables all output transfer other than stdout and stderr, whose transfer can already be disabled via other attributes. See ticket #5159.
creator: adesmet
